panels.visual: Party reaching junction in tunnels Three paths visible
panels.dialogue: Val: "The library is left. But the sabotaged runes were trying to keep us from going right."
Malrik: "When in doubt, trust fortune. Odd for right, even for left."

panels.visual: Dice showing odd Malrik turning right with grin
panels.dialogue: Malrik: "Fortune favors the bold. Right it is!"

panels.visual: Walking down right passage Malrik slowing down **Sound EFFECTS:** "...slow...mo...tion..."
